issue.title: [C++] Improve array expression and kernel evaluation performance on small inputs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16755](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16755). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is an umbrella issue for a variety of follow-up Jiras to refactor and improve the array kernels / function machinery to have less overhead and work more efficiently for parallel processing as well as small inputs (down to ~1000 elements per kernel invocation)
